summary: Collaborators Page (Vista de Colaboradores) - All frontend features verified successfully. The new CollaboratorsPage view is fully functional and integrated into the sidebar menu.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ CollaboratorsPage.jsx is well-structured with proper separation of concerns (modals as separate components)
✅ Uses useCompany context to get activeCompany and updates automatically when company changes
✅ Proper loading states and error handling implemented
✅ Owner (role='owner') correctly excluded from actions menu - cannot be edited/deleted
✅ Role badges with appropriate colors: owner=amber, admin=purple, collaborator=blue
✅ Search functionality filters by username and email
✅ Roles info panel at bottom provides clear role descriptions
seed_data_creation: No seed data created. Used existing companies: 'Academia Musical Spencer', 'Consultora Digital SAC', 'Empresa Prueba Modal'
context_for_next_testing_agent: CollaboratorsPage is a new sidebar view similar to ContactsPage. It displays collaborators for the active company with columns: Usuario, Email, Rol, Estado, Acciones. The owner cannot be edited/deleted (no actions button). Company switching updates the list automatically. Invite modal has email field and role selection (Administrador/Colaborador Operativo).

sidebar_menu: ✅ Menu item shows active state (blue highlight) when selected
collaborators_list: ✅ Table displays columns: USUARIO, EMAIL, ROL, ESTADO, ACCIONES
✅ Owner (spencer3009) shown with 'Propietario' badge in amber color
✅ Owner has 'Activo' status badge in emerald color
✅ Owner does NOT have actions button (correct - cannot be edited/deleted)
company_switching: ✅ Company selector dropdown shows all user's companies
✅ Switching from 'Academia Musical Spencer' to 'Consultora Digital SAC' works
✅ Header subtitle updates to show new company name
✅ Collaborators list refreshes to show new company's collaborators
invite_modal: ✅ Modal has email input field with placeholder 'colaborador@email.com'
✅ Modal has role selection with 'Administrador' and 'Colaborador Operativo' options
✅ Role descriptions shown: 'Acceso total excepto eliminar empresa' and 'Acceso a Finanzas, Contactos y Tableros. Sin configuraciones.'
no_company_state: ✅ Code shows 'Selecciona una empresa' message when no company is selected
✅ Instructions guide user to select company from sidebar selector
ui_design: ✅ Good color contrast for badges and text
✅ Responsive search bar with clear button
